info.title: Digital Bible Platform
info.description: An API for delivering Bible Content

tags.name: Library
tags.description: These routes retrieve all the information needed to build and retrieve audio information for each chapter/book/or volume.

tags.name: Audio
tags.description: These routes retrieve all the information needed to build and retrieve audio information for each chapter/book/or volume.

tags.name: Text
tags.description: These routes allow the caller to retrieve Bible text in a variety of configurations.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: These routes allow the caller to retrieve information about the API

200.description: This route is the endpoint for the base URLs
This route is the endpoint for the base URLs
This route is the endpoint for the base language model

parameters.name: dam_id
parameters.description: the volume internal DAM ID. Can be used to restrict the response to only DAM IDs that contain with 'N2' for example

parameters.name: fcbh_id
parameters.description: the volume FCBH DAM ID. Can be used to restrict the response to only FCBH DAM IDs that contain with 'N2' for example

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: The format of assets the caller is interested in. This specifies if you only want volumes available in text or volumes available in audio.

parameters.name: delivery
parameters.description: A criteria for approved delivery method. It is possible to OR these methods together using '|', such as "delivery=streaming_url|mobile".  'any' means any of the supported methods (this list may change over time) i.e. approved for something. 'none' means volumes that are not approved for any of the supported methods. All volumes are returned by default.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Filter the versions returned to a specified native or English language language name. For example return all the 'English' volumes.

parameters.name: full_word
parameters.description: Consider the language name as being a full word. For instance, when false, 'new' will return volumes where the string 'new' is anywhere in the language name, like in "Newari" and "Awa for Papua New Guinea". When true, it will only return volumes where the language name contains the full word 'new', like in "Awa for Papua New Guinea". Default is false.

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: the three letter language code.

parameters.name: language_family_code
parameters.description: the three letter language code for the language family.

parameters.name: updated
parameters.description: YYYY-MM-DD. This is used to get volumes that were modified since the specified date.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Publishing status of volume. The default is 'live'.

parameters.name: dbp_agreement
parameters.description: Whether or not a DBP Agreement has been executed between FCBH and the organization to whom the volume belongs.

parameters.name: expired
parameters.description: Whether the volume as passed its expiration or not.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Currently used for video volumes as they can be available in different resolutions, basically conforming to the loose general categories of low, medium, and high resolution. Low resolution is geared towards devices with smaller screens.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: Organization id of volumes to return.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Primary criteria by which to sort.  The default is 'dam_id'.

200.description: This method retrieves the list of available volumes in the system according to the filter specified.
ToDO

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: the native language or English language language name root. Can be used to restrict the response to only languages that start with 'Quechua' for example

parameters.name: full_word
parameters.description: Consider the language name as being a full word. For instance, when false, 'new' will return volumes where the string 'new' is anywhere in the language name, like in "Newari" and "Awa for Papua New Guinea". When true, it will only return volumes where the language name contains the full word 'new', like in "Awa for Papua New Guinea". Default is false.

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: the three letter language code.

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: The format of the volumes of the language families the caller is interested in. This specifies if you want language families available in text, audio or video.

parameters.name: delivery
parameters.description: A criteria for approved delivery method. It is possible to OR these methods together using '|', such as "delivery=streaming|mobile". 'any' means any of the supported methods (this list may change over time). 'none' means assets that are not approved for any of the supported methods. All returned by default.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Publishing status of volume. The default is 'live'.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Currently used for video volumes as they can be available in different resolutions, basically conforming to the loose general categories of low, medium, and high resolution. Low resolution is geared towards devices with smaller screens.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The id of an organization by which to filter the languages of available volumes.

200.description: This route returns a unique incrementing ID for each organization, the name of the organization and the number of volumes (AKA Bibles) the organization has contributed to the Koinos.
ToDO
ToDO
Gets the book order and code listing for a volume.

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description: A three letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-3 standard](http://www-01.sil.org/iso639-3/default.asp).

200.description: This call retrieves the native language book names for a DBP language code

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: The ID for the book for which to retrieve chapters

200.description: Lists the chapters for a book or all books in a standard bible volume.

parameters.name: iso
parameters.description: The Iso Code of the language

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The Starting Number of the range of numerals

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The Ending Number of the range of numerals

200.description: This route returns the vernacular numbers for a set range. The range for a single call is limited to 2000 numbers.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: Organization ID by which to filter

200.description: This route returns information about the volume and it's associated organizations

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The partial or complete name of the organization in either the organization's native language or English.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the id of the organization

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: The enabled status of the organization

200.description: This route returns information about the volume and it's associated organizations

parameters.name: dam_id
parameters.description: The DAM ID of the verse info.

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: If specified returns verse text ONLY for the specified book.

parameters.name: chapter_id
parameters.description: If specified returns verse text ONLY for the specified book and chapter.

parameters.name: verse_start
parameters.description: If specified without 'verse_end' returns verse text ONLY for the specified book, chapter, and verse. If specified with 'verse_end' returns all verse text for the specified book, chapter, and verse range from 'verse_start' to 'verse_end'.

parameters.name: verse_end
parameters.description: If specified returns of all verse text for the specified book, chapter, and verse range from 'verse_start' to 'verse_end'. If specified requires that 'verse' is also specified.

200.description: This route is the endpoint for the base URLs

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: Allows the caller to restrict potential servers from being returned that don't support a specified protocol.

200.description: ToDO

parameters.name: dam_id
parameters.description: The DAM ID for which to retrieve file path info.

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: The audio encoding format desired.

parameters.name: book_order
parameters.description: The order number of the book in the volume. This is particularly useful for story volumes as there are no applicable OSIS book codes.

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: The OSIS id of the book. If book is not specified ALL book/chapter information for the given language is returned to the caller. Otherwise chapter information for the specified book is returned.

parameters.name: chapter_id
parameters.description: The id for the specified chapter. If chapter is specified only the specified chapter audio information is returned to the caller.

200.description: This call returns the file path information for audio files for a volume. This information can be used with the response of the /audio/location call to create a URI to retrieve the audio files.

parameters.name: dam_id
parameters.description: The DAM ID of the audio volume

parameters.name: osis_code
parameters.description: The book for verse times desired.

parameters.name: chapter_number
parameters.description: The chapter for the verse times desired

200.description: ToDO

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the font to retrieve

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Search for a specific font by name

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Only return fonts that have been authorized for the specified platform.

200.description: Some languages used by the Digital Bible Platform utilize character sets that are not supported by "standard" fonts. This call provides a list of custom fonts that have been made available.

parameters.name: dam_id
parameters.description: The DAM ID of the verse text

parameters.name: book_id
parameters.description: If specified returns verse text ONLY for the specified book.

parameters.name: chapter_id
parameters.description: If specified returns verse text ONLY for the specified book and chapter.

parameters.name: verse_start
parameters.description: If specified without 'verse_end' returns verse text ONLY for the specified book, chapter, and verse. If specified with 'verse_end' returns all verse text for the specified book, chapter, and verse range from 'verse_start' to 'verse_end'.

parameters.name: verse_end
parameters.description: If specified returns of all verse text for the specified book, chapter, and verse range from 'verse_start' to 'verse_end'. If specified requires that 'verse' is also specified.

parameters.name: markup
parameters.description: If specified returns the verse text in a variety of standardized markup formats. By default the internal DBT format is returned. Current options include OSIS, and native (the default DBT format).

200.description: This method retrieves the bible verse text for the specified volume/book/chapter.

key.name: key
key.description: The API key that's been generated for you.

echo.name: echo
echo.description: If unused the results are as before. If set to true, the results will be prepended with the array of calling arguments used. This does mean that the results will be one layer deeper as the results will be an array where the first element is the array of input arguments and the second element will be the results as normally returned.

version.name: key
version.description: The API key that's been generated for you.

reply.name: reply
reply.description: Specifies the response type requested by the caller. Default is json.

callback.name: callback
callback.description: If unused the results are as before. If set to true, the results will be prepended with the array of calling arguments used. This does mean that the results will be one layer deeper as the results will be an array where the first element is the array of input arguments and the second element will be the results as normally returned.

dam_id.name: dam_id
dam_id.description: To get the location directory and asset file basename for a specific volume.

language_code.description: This field is a legacy field from when it was possible for there to be a different language code than the iso code. Now it's just a duplicate of language_iso.

language_iso.description: A three letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-3 standard](http://www-01.sil.org/iso639-3/default.asp). If the Iso Code Exists the Glotto Code is not required but may exist!

language_iso_2B.description: The Bibliographic two letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-2B standard](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php).

language_iso_2T.description: The Terminological two letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-2T standard](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php).

language_code.description: A three letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-3 standard](http://www-01.sil.org/iso639-3/default.asp). If the Iso Code Exists the Glotto Code is not required but may exist!

language_iso.description: A three letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-3 standard](http://www-01.sil.org/iso639-3/default.asp). If the Iso Code Exists the Glotto Code is not required but may exist!

language_iso_2B.description: The Bibliographic two letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-2B standard](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php).

language_iso_2T.description: The Terminological two letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-2T standard](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php).

language_family_code.description: A three letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-3 standard](http://www-01.sil.org/iso639-3/default.asp). If the Iso Code Exists the Glotto Code is not required but may exist!

language_family_iso.description: A three letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-3 standard](http://www-01.sil.org/iso639-3/default.asp). If the Iso Code Exists the Glotto Code is not required but may exist!

language_family_iso_2B.description: The Bibliographic two letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-2B standard](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php).

language_family_iso_2T.description: The Terminological two letter identifier for the languages resources. This code matches up exactly with the codes from the [ISO 639-2T standard](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php).

language.description: array of language codes of languages in family.

organization_name.description: The Name of the Organization in English

number_volumes.description: The number of biblical resources the organization has contributed to Koinos

dbp_agreement.description: Whether or not a DBP Agreement has been executed between FCBH and the organization to whom the volume belongs.

language_name.description: native language name of the language of the volume.

language_english.description: English language name of the language of the volume.

language_family_code.description: DBP language code of language family to which this language belongs.

language_family_name.description: native language name of language family to which this language belongs.

language_family_english.description: English language name of language family to which this language belongs.

updated_on.description: Date and time of last update.

right_to_left.description: Indicating that the language is read right to left.

num_art.description: Number of art files for this volume.

num_sample_audio.description: Number of sample audio files for this volume.

media_type.description: The variety of the media, such as drama and non-drama.

resolution.description: Array of resolutions available, if applicable.

font.description: If this volume has text that cannot be displayed properly using most standard fonts, a custom font will be assigned. This field can either be null (no font assigned), or a JSON object containing information about the font. For information about the structure of this JSON object, see the documentation for the /text/font call.

dam_id.description: The volume for which the event occurred.

time.description: The timestamp at which the event occurred.

book_order.description: An integer to order the books by.

book_id.description: The OSIS book code for the book

book_name.description: The Name of the book in the vernacular language of the bible text

dam_id_root.description: The identifying string for the Bible

book_id.description: The OSIS book code for the book

book_name.description: The Name of the book in the vernacular language of the bible text

default.description: A legacy value from the old system

name.example: Nhm Phin Dch Cc Gi Kinh Phng V gi bn quyn reserved

english_name.example: Translation Group Liturgy of the Hours, All rights reserved

verse_text.example: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

id.description: The numeric ID of the font

base_url.description: The server directory that the font file(s) can be found in

files.description: A JSON object representing the files available for the font. This JSON object is structured as follows

verse_text.description: The full text of the result returned.

verse_text.example: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.

book_id.description: unique ID for the associated book for this chapter

path.description: relative file path for the audio

verse_start.description: time start in seconds of the verse

country_image.description: Link to country flag image of requested size

country_additional.description: Colon separated list of optional countries
